Boca-juniors.title: Boca Juniors
Boca-juniors.text: Founded in 1905 by five Italian immigrants in the La Boca neighborhood, Buenos Aires, Argentina, Club Atl√©tico Boca Juniors has been one of the most successful and popular clubs in Argentine soccer. Throughout its history, the team has won 74 titles, including 6 Liberating Cups, 4 South American Cups, 3 Intercontinental Cups, 2 South American Cups, 1 Gold Cup, 1 South American Super Cup and 1 Super Cup Masters, in addition to 23 local titles.
